data.name: Breach Wanderers
data.detailed_description:
Check out these other deckbuilders


About the Game

Roguelite Collectible Card Game

Play with Breach Wanderer’s unique deckbuilding system: before each run, you can customize your starting deck as well as the pool of cards that will be offered to you during the run. With over 700 cards to choose from, you will have plenty of options to find interesting combinations of cards.


Your Choices Matter

Every enemy in Breach Wanderers presents a different challenge and offers 2 unique card rewards. Choose your path carefully to build the best deck possible. With control over your character, your cards, and your path, you can never blame your luck for your misfortune.


Choose Your Hero

Breach Wanderer features 7 different characters who each bring something unique to the gameplay, through their 20 character cards and unique passive skills.
While Silan creates a Cannon Blast every turn, Mirley prefers a subtler approach, using her cards to become Hidden and before backstabbing her foes. Every character is different, with their own strengths and weaknesses.


Upgrade Your Town

Gather resources in your adventures and use them to unlock new cards and upgrade your town. The Forge lets you purchase upgrades for your heroes, while the Market offers a new selection of wares every day. Unlock and upgrade the Shrine to enable additional challenges, if you’ve got what it takes!


Strategic Gameplay

Use your decks in challenging and difficult battles throughout your runs. Each turn, you will need to carefully balance your mana, your offense and your defense. You also have access to a plethora of buffs and debuffs, as well as special status bars such as Arcane, Frost and Shock, with powerful effects.


Roadmap

What can you expect from the full game?

  • 10 playable characters, each suiting a different playstyle
  • 6 dangerous areas to explore
  • 5 buildings to customize and upgrade your town
  • Over 1000 cards

data.short_description: Strategize through difficult battles in this new take on Roguelite Deckbuilders. Breach Wanderers lets you fine-tune your decks before each run, allowing for varied playstyles with many unique characters to choose from. Join our growing community to find exciting new deck ideas and share your own!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 and newer
  • Processor: Intel i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
